author: nvgrw
message:
Migrate params_test to use PjRt.

PiperOrigin-RevId: 826137636

files.patch:
@@ -714,10 +714,12 @@ xla_test(
     shard_count = 15,
     tags = [
         "optonly",
+        "test_migrated_to_hlo_runner_pjrt",
     ],
     deps = [
         ":client_library_test_runner_mixin",
-        ":hlo_test_base",
+        ":hlo_pjrt_interpreter_reference_mixin",
+        ":hlo_pjrt_test_base",
         ":xla_internal_test_main",  # fixdeps: keep
         "//xla:array2d",
         "//xla:error_spec",
